member.summary: Main constructor

members.member: The following are all wrapper methods for Memory.Methods *

member.summary: Get the status of the client.

member.summary: Check whether or not the client is logged in.

member.summary: Wrapper method for Packets.Packet.SendPacket.

member.summary: Bring this Tibia window to the foreground. Wrapper for SetForegroundWindow.

member.summary: Return the character name.

member.summary: Get a list of all the open clients. Class method.

member.summary: Get the client's player.

member.summary: Get the client's process.

member.summary: Get the client's battlelist.

member.name: M:Tibia.Objects.Client.makeRune(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Make a rune with the specified id. Wrapper for makeRune(Rune).
member.returns: True if the rune succeeded, false if the rune id doesn't exist or creation failed.

member.name: M:Tibia.Objects.Client.eatFood
member.summary: Eat food found in any container.
member.returns: True if eating succeeded, false if no food found or eating failed.

member.name: M:Tibia.Objects.Client.makeRune(Tibia.Objects.Rune)
member.summary: Make a rune. Drags a blank to the right hand, casts the words, and moved the new rune back. TODO add option to change the hand and a method to make sure the hand is free. TODO add option to check for soul points
member.returns: True if everything went well, false if no blank was found or part or all of the process failed
